summary: A memorandum from a forensic psychologist at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York regarding Jeffrey Epstein, confirming that psychology externs from several universities had no contact with him. The document appears to be part of internal prison administration records.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced as inmate #76301-054 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, subject of the memorandum regarding lack of contact with psychology externs.

persons.name: Warden
persons.context: Recipient of the memorandum from the forensic psychologist regarding inmate Epstein.

persons.name: Psy.D., Ph D., Forensic Psychologist
persons.context: Author of the memorandum to the warden regarding psychology externs' lack of contact with Epstein.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York
keyFacts: The document is a memorandum dated August 13, 2019, regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76301-054).
It states that psychology externs working in the psychology department had no contact with Epstein.
The externs were from John Jay University, University of Hartford, Philadelphia College of Osteopathic Medicine, and Adelphi University.
The document appears to be part of prison administration records from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
